resources.string: Are you want to exit the test?
There are ongoing tests, please exit these tests first!
Choose at least one test case!
Please set the number of tests (unit: times)
Please set the test duration (unit: hour)
Are you want to stop testing?
The Bluetooth test will continue to turn on, off, and scan nearby Bluetooth devices, support classic Bluetooth and low-power Bluetooth, and support automatic identification of test results.
Cannot search for any Bluetooth device end test for 3 consecutive times
Please be sure to find at least one valid Bluetooth device nearby!
The CPU test supports three modes: fixed frequency, random frequency, and specified CPU usage.
This device does not support CPU stress testing!
Failed to set [USERSPACE_MODE], the product may not be able to perform CPU frequency conversion test!
Failed to set the CPU frequency, the product may not be able to perform CPU frequency conversion test!
Failed to set the random CPU frequency, the product may not be able to perform CPU frequency conversion test!
The WiFi test will continue to turn on, off, and scan nearby WiFi hotspots to support automatic identification of test results.
3 consecutive connection failures end the test
Please go to the system settings and open a valid WIFI hotspot!
The sleep test will continue to sleep and wake up the device. Manually observe whether sleep and wakeup are normal.
Please set the wake up time!
The video test will play the video file repeatedly. During the test, please observe the video is black, is blurred, is stuck, the audio and video are synchronized.
The memory test automatically malloc the memory usage to the selected percent, verifying the strong of the system under low memory.
Reboot the test to verify the reliability of the device restart. If the restart interrupt indicates that the test failed.
Check the SD card status after rebooting
Check the WIFI connection status after rebooting
Are you want to restart the test? After confirming, the system will be restarted after %d seconds.
The flight mode test will continue to turn on and off the flight mode, while scanning nearby WiFi hotspots to support automatic identification of test results.
Judging result by WIFI connection status
Restoring the factory will erase all data, please insert UDisk to save the state.
Are you want to restore the factory settings test? After confirming, the factory settings will be restored after %d seconds.
